executive_summary: Shri K. K. Tardia, RCOM Guwahati, is placed under suspension with immediate effect for violating the MMDR Act 1957 and disobeying instructions from IBM regarding the approval of Mining Plans for Graphite in Arunachal Pradesh.
allegations: Violation of MMDR Act 1957 and related rules
Disobedience of instructions issued by IBM
inquiry_findings: The officer violated the MMDR Act 1957 and failed to follow IBM instructions regarding Mining Plans approval.
conclusion: The officer is placed under suspension.
